attributes.action: Make politicians adhere to promises made to the public.
attributes.additional_details: The recent debacle of lies and empty promises made by Brexit politicians such as Boris Johnson and Niger ferage cannot continue. Legislation must be implemented to ensure that the public are not manipulated and lied to in future political proceedings.
attributes.background: Legislation needs to be implemented, to ensure politicians adhere to promises made before referendums, elections and whilst in office. Many politicians make empty promises to secure votes and push hidden agendas. It is time that the public has a fair democratic system, upon which they can trust.
